Module project
Package main.dao

Class OrderDAO

java.lang.Object
main.dao.OrderDAO
public class OrderDAO extends Object
Data access methods for orders: placing orders, querying order lists and updating order status. Methods use JDBC connections obtained from DatabaseAdapter.

  • Method Details

    • placeOrder

      public static int placeOrder(String username, double totalPrice, javafx.collections.ObservableList<Product> cartItems)
      Place a simple order (legacy method). Inserts an order and its items, updates product stock, and returns the generated order id.
      Parameters:
      username - the customer username
      totalPrice - the total price value
      cartItems - the items to insert as order_items
      Returns:
      created order id, or -1 on failure
